# Welcome {.unnumbered}

Welcome, everyone, to our AI-focused workshop for science faculty and postdocs: Is Machine Learning Suitable for Your Projects?

This workshop is organized by the Dean's Office, Faculty of Science. In this workshop, you will discover how machine learning can improve your research projects. The workshop is tailored for participants with some programming background. We will demystify the fundamentals of machine learning and clarify what it can and cannot do for your work and/or research. By the end of the workshop, you will be familiar with the fundamentals of machine learning and basics of deep learning.
